title: Arabic Symbols Font
content:
King Fahd Glorious Quran Printing Complex, released Arabic Symbols Font. KFGQPC already released two fonts, Uthman Taha Naskh Medium and Uthman Taha Naskh Bold. These fonts are free for everyone.

Home page:  
 [http://fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017012035/http:/fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/ "http://fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa")

Download Link for Arabic Symbols Font:  
 [http://fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/download/Symbols1\_Ver02.otf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017012035/http:/fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/download/Symbols1_Ver02.otf "http://fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/download/Symbols1\_Ver02.otf")

Downlaod Link for Naskh Fonts:  
 [http://fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/download/UthmanTN1\_Ver07.zip](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017012035/http:/fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/download/UthmanTN1_Ver07.zip "http://fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/download/UthmanTN1\_Ver07.zip")
author: Ashfaq_Niazi
